item.description:
We have rescheduled since a few of you could not make it on 5/15.

Join us for horseback riding at Bobby's Ranch in Acton. It is an hour long ride through serene trails with well trained horses and staff. We will go for ice cream nearby after the ride.

If you need a ride or can provide a ride, please note that in your RSVP. Our members are pretty good with providing carpools.

Cost: $35 for one hour ride.

We do not have to prepay, but please do not RSVP unless you plan to go. They do charge for no shows.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Horseback Riding
